Reviews.Title: sim card
Reviews.Author: Maci Shayne
Reviews.Content: I might be sending the phone back. I put my sim card in it and at first it took several minutes but it finally read it. The sms worked but the mms and data didn't. I checked the apn settings and they were correct. I powered the phone off and back on and when I powered it back on, it wouldn't read the sim at all. Also, the battery life is about an hour and a half.

Reviews.Content: THE GREATEST  GIFTS FOR ELEMENTARY AND COLLEGE GRAND KIDS .  EVERYBODY  IS EMPRESSED AND THINK YOU SPENT LOTS OF MONEY.

Reviews.Title: It was nice but had some issues
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone and everything but the google play app was messing up making it to where the phone was pretty much useless. I couldnt uninstall it because its programmed into the phone so there was no way to fix it. Now Im trying to get my money back. Its really sucks that I couldn't use this phone.

Reviews.Title: gsm android tablet phone

Reviews.Content: i love the phone. my only problem with it is that. the voulume to low and you cant use bluetooth. other then that. its a good phone. every now and then i just power off bye itself

Reviews.Title: Great Android
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great tablet. It simple to use and has a ton of feature to it. It just a solid device. I love how well I can stream Netflix with this device. This android works great with the a memory card from New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!. I recommend getting this android. It really is great.

Reviews.Content: It say unlocked but it not.not satisfy with this product. And there are no phone number that I can call

ProductInfo.Features:
SVP's new 7 inch 2-in-1 PHONE+TABLET=PHABLET
2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900 Android Smartphone ; Supports ONE SIM card, compatible with T-Mobile and AT&T;
Operating System: Android 4.0 ; Supports Google Play Store, Skype, Netflix, YouTube, Flash, Wifi, videos, and more!
Dual camera: front: 0.3 megapixel + back: 2.0 megapixel
Internal Memory: 4GB Nand flash ; External Memory: supports up to 1 x 32GB MicroSD card
ProductInfo.Name: SVP® 7" 2G GSM Android Capacitive Touchscreen Phablet Tablet Smartphone - Unlocked
